title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: I’m Stuck On The Same Day For A Thousand Years
summary:
Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
——The time is: July 8, 2020

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: White Moon He Made a Move On Me
summary: A sassy, drop-dead gorgeous heiress clashes with the refined, high-and-mighty CEO, Mr. Bao Jinlan. Jiang Yaoyao had a secret crush on Bao Jinlan for ages, being super cautious and discreet about it, until one day, she woke up in a hotel room with him sleeping right next to her... And then, she somehow became Bao Jinlan's fiancée. Nobody dared to mess with her in the Jiang family anymore, and the big shots in the city's social scene respected her to no end. Everywhere she went, the youngsters would call her 'Big Sis,' and Mr. Bao? Well, he suddenly got addicted to being around her.

title: I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: Juvenile Prison
summary:
Juyeong is in a juvenile detention center for the attempted murder of his father, Gang-ryong. He clings to hope, dreaming of a future in Seoul with his childhood friend, Dayeon. 

But everything shatters when Dayeon is tragically killed by a rogue truck, and the devastation deepens when Juyeong learns that his father was behind the wheel. 

In a cruel twist, Gang-ryong regains consciousness and offers Juyeong an ultimatum...

"If you want revenge, become the king of this detention center!"

 Now, Juyeong must navigate the treacherous world of prison politics, determined to rise to power and avenge his friend.

title: Trillions of Resources in Apocalypse
summary: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

title: The Awakening of light Magic
summary:
The "Idols" don't only sing, they use magic too. Do you believe in Idols?  
Idols in the world of Lapis Re:LiGHTs use magic too!  
  
Tiara aims to be an Idol (Witch) that makes everyone around her smile! Will she be able to fulfill her dream at Flora High, a school that trains witches?

title: The Villain’s Daughter Plans to Run Away
summary:
I'll make my evil dad good and survive this time!
I was killed for being the villain's daughter, but when I opened my eyes, I was 14 years back in time. Too young and penniless, I decided to wait to escape... But why should I have to run away?! What if I train my dad to be good instead?

title: Our Guild’s Idol
summary: "Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...

title: The Returned C-Rank Tank Won’t Die!
summary: A C-rank tank, abandoned by her teammates to die, awakens a rare regenerative ability after enduring countless deaths. Now immortal but traumatized, she must decide her next move in a world that betrayed her.

title: Elqueeness
summary:
Kang Ji-hoon, an ordinary high school student who died in a painful accident, finds out in the underworld that he is actually a ‘Water Spirit King mistakenly born as a human’. “Making water spirits? How do you do that?” The adventures of Elqueeness, the Water Spirit King who was mistakenly born as a human!  
  
Raw [23-2-2021] : Chapter 177

title: You Are My Desire
summary:
With a height of 192 cm and a scar on his face, Ujioka Tasuku is mistaken for a “scary person” by those around him, and his student life has been lonely up until now. On his first day of high school, Ujioka is determined to make friends and have a fun high school life, but a shocking encounter with Shimohoshizaki Kodzuru awaits him after she trips on a banana peel! She's completely out of it, but Ujioka is touched by Shimohoshizaki's hard work and she doesn't judge Ujioka by his appearance, so they decide to become friends!? They're beginners at both friends and youth, but together, they'll do their best in their youth!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E5%90%9B%E3%81%AF%E3%81%8A%E3%82%8C%E3%81%AE%E5%84%AA%E3%81%97%E3%81%8F%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84%E6%98%A5)

title: Player Super Justice
summary: Annan, a senior game producer, traveled to the foggy continent of another world and became a rare elite NPC with a player system. But he still has a heart that belongs to a player. Although I love to stir up trouble and act recklessly, I am a good player and a righteous partner favored by this world. Now I am carrying the main quest, as a righteous player, I am ordered by heaven to eliminate you, the evil NPC!

title: It’s Finally Love, Demon Lord!
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Baby Pharmacist Princess
summary:
Just by clicking the wrong button, I ended up possessing the game's princess character, "Cherise"! Yoon Che-ri, a graduate of a pharmaceutical university. Like the so-called 'hardcore gamer' she is, She unexpectedly appears in the VR game she plays every day. A red rabbit puts her in debt to the game, owing 10 billion gems...

If she doesn't repay the debt of 10 billion gems, she won't be able to log out?

♡ Surprise Quest Triggered ♡

User's ability confirmed as "Pharmaceuticals," customized settings have been completed accordingly. Future quests will focus on "Pharmaceuticals."

[Confirm] ◀

Huh? Why do I feel excessively capable...? If things go on like this, I might be able to return soon!
Will Cherise really be able to settle the 10 billion gem debt and return to her original world?

title: I Became the Master of the Devil
summary:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

title: ??? Rank no Ura Soubi Musou
summary: What would you do if you suddenly regained memories of your past life and realized you were living in a world that was once a game you played? Jinfrey chooses to use his knowledge as an OG gamer and exploit the game’s secrets so he can become an unparalleled adventurer. But he’ll have to be careful because if he dies, it’s game over! Will he be able to find all of the hidden rank equipment, defeat the bosses, and give his family the life they deserve?

title: Pseudo Love
summary: Baek Ga-in is a university student doing multiple jobs, living a double life as a demon worship concept streamer 'Lucia.' She has been carrying past scars of being entangled within a cult but suddenly her stream attracts a real demon, an 'incubus'?! A demon, human and... an angel?! This is not a 'cult' it is that campus fantasy romance!!

title: Only Love
summary: Tohgoh Haruka, who is respected (and sometimes feared) by her coworkers, has been hiding the fact that she's a lesbian. She is starting to feel attracted to Sayama, who is the only coworker who really acts friendly to her. Tohgoh has built up a wall around herself because she doesn't like it when people feel uncomfortable around her. However, Sayama recently found out that Tohgoh is a lesbian. Will their work dynamic change or will something else change?

title: A Cadet Becomes a Prophet?!
summary:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

title: Merry Marbling
summary: When he was young, Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then, Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon, who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building, could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival, Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly, Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However, Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it, Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know, whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water, these two create a beautiful dissonance.

title: I Became the Tyrant’s Servant
summary: I transmigrated into an explicit 19+ novel as the villain. And it happened to be at the moment when I was about to take over the Emperor on the bed. Until then, I thought I had died without moving a muscle. Enoch Philip de Harte was a tyrant who hated any contact with others. But he insists that I am the cure to melt the ice in his heart and follows me around…

title: Hello! Veterinarian!
summary:
**Original Webtoon:**
[KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62711843), [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%88%98%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC%EB%8B%98-%EC%95%88%EB%85%95%ED%95%98%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94/3732)

title: I Quit My Job to Become the Genius Court Mage
summary:
"Anyone who threatens my peace, regardless of who they are, I'll be sure to kill them."

Rose Freyman is a genius girl who became a court magician, an elite profession, at the young age of ten. Being a court magician is a prestigious occupation that everyone admires. However, despite the honor her position carried, she was nothing more than a glorified "corporate slave." Fed up with such a life, she saved enough money to be able to live without having to work ever again and resigned. Thus began her slow life in a remote house on the frontier. During the day, she would take walks while gathering medicinal herbs. At night, she would soak leisurely in the bathtub and sleep soundly in a large bed. Rose's life seemed as if it would be nothing but rosy, having begun what appeared to be an ideal lifestyle.

However——

This is actually the story of a genius magician who, while striving to protect her own peace, ended up leaving behind a legacy of countless legends——

title: The Unwelcome Guests of House Fildette
summary:
The 'Count of Fildette's', famous for being scandalous and uneducated. The Counts are the main culprits in eroding the honor of the venerable family, but fortunately, thanks to the couple's clever and lovely only son, 'Hayden', the Countess of Fildette's manages to keep the peace. Hayden is the pride of the count, and at the same time, the only link between the counts and the couple who growls at each other, and the center of peace. But the peace Hayden created is nothing more than a thin ice curtain that hides the depths of the water. Behind it, old misunderstandings, mistrust, and unspeakable secrets are deposited in the far-off darkness... Then one day, unexpected guests suddenly come and walk on the ice curtain?! Peace of those who are slowly cracking! The count struggles with the uncomfortable truth, but he realizes that in the sediment of misunderstandings, the feelings of cherishing each other are together like a treasure. The story of a family who overcame misunderstandings, supports each other, and grows together.
The story of the Count Fildette's family in search of true love and peace.

title: My Younger Sister Chooses Me Tonight
summary:
Arin, the adopted daughter of a chaebol family, harbours a twisted affection for her stepmother. After she becomes an adult, Arin accidentally realises that she has unusual abilities.
She tries to use her abilities to attract her stepmother's attention, but her stepbrothers, not her stepmother, want Arin...

A dangerous adopted daughter who shakes up the conglomerate 'Rare Moon' family. Her twisted red romance!

title: Haesi’s New Path
summary:
Haeru, who was gifted with the mysterious power to foresee the future, rejects her fate and flees. One day, a peculiar scholar appears before her! A man who constantly gets lost, tells lies, and insists that fighting is done with the mind, not the body. From the moment she meets him, Haeru's halted fate begins to move again.
In 15th century Joseon, a sweet yet dangerous tale of love and war unfolds between the greatest genius king, untold by history, and a mysterious woman bound by the chains of destiny!

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: The Villainess Refuses to Flirt with the Male Lead
summary:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Fuck you, god!" 凸(｀⌒´メ)凸

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/59080258)

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: The Beast Tamed by the Evil Woman
summary:
Written as the villainess, Ilyana Glayne finds a noble boy named Magnus and tames him, causing him to lose his identity and become her submissive "beast." While reading this story, a fan emails the author to inquire about the plot. When she wakes up the next morning, she finds she has become Ilyana herself! Disgusted by Ilyana’s actions, she vows to free Magnus from his beastly existence. But when Magnus steals a kiss from her, Ilyana realizes she may have changed the plot more than she wanted!

---
The only real villain in the novel, took a handsome man and tamed him for the rest of his life. After putting his fear to the limit, he learned to plead with her, becoming a beast from which he could never escape even if he loosened his leash. However, one day, the beast falls in love and becomes emperor with the woman who saved him, and plunges the evil woman into an eternal bondage.

---
I've posessed the body of the sociopathic villainess, Illyana! An evil villainess who picks up a boy named Magnus and raises him however she pleases... that Illyana is me?!

"I am going to tame you into a beast that cannot do anything without me. Just as you had done to me."

And after 2 years, he who had become an emperor began his revenge. Excuse me, author! Illyana was the sinner but why must I suffer his vengeance? I was just a normal reader named Yuna!

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: Is the Friend of a Friend a Stranger?
summary:
Seven years ago, I promised my best male friend that we would always be friends. When I reunited with him in high school, he was... the neatest and most beautiful girl in the school!? And yet, she acts the same old way only in front of me...
___
**Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4)

**Additional Sites:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tenbin_sneaker)

title: A Former S-rank Adventurer Who Was Betrayed By His Griends Because He Was Too Strong Wants to Live a Slow Life in The Countryside
summary: Luke Othyde, the kingdom’s strongest S-rank adventurer, was executed by his own comrades for being too strong. A few months later, a man in a black helmet appears in a remote village, possessing powers greater than Luke’s. His name is Lugo. Due to his extraordinary powers, those around him view him with suspicion, but despite that, the strongest man wrapped in mystery enjoys the best slow life!

title: The Terminally Ill Young Master of the Baek Clan
summary: Baek Yigang is a son of the Baek Clan, one of the seven great clans of Zhongyuan. Afflicted with the Taiyin Qi Blockage, he is cursed with a shortened lifespan and the inability to collect internal energy. He had been peacefully spending the rest of his days indoors when he was ambushed by a group of masked people. During the ambush, he lost his servant who was like a sister to him. Chased by the attackers, Baek Yigang escaped through a secret underground path. When he came across a blocked path, he decided he’d at least die fighting and picked up a rusted sword that was stuck in the ground…

title: Try Begging Me
summary:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?

title: There is no mercy
summary:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.

title: In the Doghouse
summary: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?

title: I’m the Main Character’s Child
summary:
---
**Note:**
- This manga contains storyboard drafts the author created for Jump Magazine to be considered for serialization. [Source](https://x.com/kuzushinsetsu/status/742325718541967360)

**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/14502453/series/57948) (Note: The chapter order is reversed), [Niconico Redirect](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/21927)

title: Astral Pet Store
summary:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title: Overtime
summary:
Limbo is a shut-in girl who doesn't care for anything except her tentacle comics. Aside from that, everything else is meaningless. On her birthday she wished for the "destruction of the world" and was instead met with a demonic female programmer!   
  
The two instantly hit it off, bonding over their common goal of world destruction, the two "project partners" hustle hard everyday to bring the world to an end with hilarious effect.

title: You are pretty
summary: This is the typical protagonist setting so my cheats should be coming, right! Unexpectedly, that night, my fiancée suddenly took back her words: I won’t annul this marriage! I want us to live and sleep together! I’ll also take care of all our living expenses! Okay, let’s do it, I have nothing to lose anyway. After one night… Eh, there’s something a bit wrong with my fiancée?

title: Life on the Flower Road of the Grand Duchess
summary:
She was born to received the curse, to disappear. So, she accepted the marriage proposal to be free from her family before she dies but... the hospitality and affection she received from her in-laws are endless and her husband's obsession is mysterious... A flower path unfolds in front of her, who was a time limit!

---
For centuries, the firstborn of House Helsington has been cursed to die young, so the family produces an illegitimate child, Isabella, to take on the curse instead. To get away from her terrible home and live her last days in peace, she wants nothing more than to escape. Her chance comes when Grand Duke Noverdic asks her to marry his son, Cleor. Once she arrives in the north, she is showered with endless affection from both her in-laws and her fiancé... to the point that it's almost suspicious.

---
